title: BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Is Aware Of Info In Market About Its Gold Processing Plant At Sandstone
text:
BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Is Aware Of Info In Market About Its Gold Processing Plant At Sandstone

Commodities Sep 13, 2019 09:10

© Reuters. BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Is Aware Of Info In Market About Its Gold Processing Plant At Sandstone Sept 13 (Reuters) - Middle Island Resources Ltd : * BECOME AWARE OF INFORMATION IN MARKET ABOUT CO'S 600,000TPA GOLD PROCESSING PLANT AT SANDSTONE, WESTERN AUSTRALIA * CONFIRMS THAT IF IT ACQUIRES ALTO METALS LIMITED IT PLANS TO REFURBISH SANDSTONE PLANT WITHIN 5 MONTHS * MIDDLE ISLAND RESOURCES SAYS RECENT ENQUIRIES LEAD IT TO BELIEVE THAT REFURBISHMENT COST OF $10.3M (NYSE: ) WILL NOT MATERIALLY CHANGE

BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Is Aware Of Info In Market About Its Gold Processing Plant At Sandstone
description: BRIEF-Middle Island Resources Says Is Aware Of Info In Market About Its Gold Processing Plant At Sandstone
